translations: n.下沉者（或物）；下坠球（sinker 的复数形式）

phrs.translation: 沉降片, 恶化者, 含脂率低的生油料, 表演者
坠和浮漂, 坠和飞蚊症
吹气, 压缩空气吹清洁生克片

sentences.sentence: I realize lighter sinkers give the lure a more natural reaction.
sentences.translation: 我也知道轻一点的铅可以给饵自然得多的姿态。

sentences.sentence: This huge yellow-green diamonds for the round, was inlaid into a huge sinkers necklace.
sentences.translation: 这颗巨型钻石为黄绿色圆形，被镶嵌成一个硕大的项链坠。

sentences.sentence: If you use ultra heavy sinkers in very deep water, a 2 speed mechanism can be handy when you are just plain exhausted hauling up sinkers.
sentences.translation: 如果您在非常深的水超稠油坠，一个2速度机制可以方便当你只是简单用尽牵引注册坠。
